title: What are your thoughts about the different philosophies between chiropractic and allopathic medicine?
description: Answer (1 of 5): Allopathic Doctor here. Well aware of the years of prejudice against Chiropractors . ] My opinion is that came from their early history stating that they could treat all types of rather medical diseases by manipulating the spine. Of course this seems ridiculous to allopathic doc...
